name: Goblin's Shop
description: This is a pixel-art simulation game in which the player runs a shop, together with RPG adventures. In Goblinâ€™s Shop, the player is a goblin who has been bullied by humans and he always wants to get it even. Unfortunately, however, Mr. Goblin realizes that he is too weak to beat any human soldier.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.20GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
